segments.text: I'm watching this scene, and my frustration is growing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can the woman not notice the overflowing sink?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally soaking in a puddle, and she's just polishing a plate!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's completely infuriating to see such blatant unawareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children are so close to a serious fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is wobbling, and they're just focused on cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to step in and fix this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage alone will be significant if this continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a comedy of errors, but with serious consequences.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and get their attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is making me quite agitated, honestly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic example of ignoring obvious problems right under your nose.
segments.speaker: PAR
